properties.name: com.c4_soft.springaddons.security.keycloak.client-id
properties.description: OAuth2 client ID as declared on Authorization-server

properties.name: com.c4_soft.springaddons.security.auth0.roles-claim
properties.description: OAuth2 client ID as declared on Authorization-server

properties.name: com.c4_soft.springaddons.security.cors.path
properties.description: Comma separated list of ANT style path for authorized CORS

properties.name: com.c4_soft.springaddons.security.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma separated list of allowed origins

properties.name: com.c4_soft.springaddons.security.permit-all
properties.description: Comma separated list of opened URIs
